title: Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life
author: Héctor García and Francesc Miralles
description: Explore the Japanese secret to longevity and happiness through the concept of Ikigai.

title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to breaking bad habits and adopting good ones that stick.

title: Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World
author: Cal Newport
description: A manifesto and a guide on how to achieve extraordinary results with deep, singular focus.

title: The Psychology of Money: Timeless Lessons on Wealth, Greed, and Happiness
author: Morgan Housel
description: Understanding the behavior of money and how people think about wealth.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad: What the Rich Teach Their Kids About Money That the Poor and Middle Class Do Not!
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
description: The story of a person who had two fathers, a rich one and a poor one, to illustrate the need for financial education.

title: Rework
author: Jason Fried and David Heinemeier Hansson
description: A refreshing, straightforward take on the business world, offering an alternative path to success.

title: How to Get Rich
author: Felix Dennis
description: Straightforward advice on building wealth from a self-made millionaire.

title: Naruto, Vol. 1: Uzumaki Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: The epic tale of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja leader.

title: One Piece, Vol. 1: Romance Dawn
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Join Monkey D. Luffy as he embarks on his quest to find the One Piece and become the Pirate King.

title: Black Clover, Vol. 1
author: Yūki Tabata
description: Follow Asta and Yuno as they aim for the same goal but take different paths: becoming the Wizard King.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life
author: Mark Manson
description: A self-help guide that provides raw and honest advice aimed at helping you focus on the things that truly matter.

title: Think and Grow Rich
author: Napoleon Hill
description: Originally published during the Great Depression, this book offers timeless lessons on how to leverage your personal strengths to achieve success.

title: 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change
author: Stephen R. Covey
description: A holistic approach to life and professionalism that can transform one's life.

title: Dare to Lead: Brave Work. Tough Conversations. Whole Hearts.
author: Brené Brown
description: An exploration of what it takes to be a daring leader and how true leadership stems from vulnerability and resilience.

title: Berserk, Vol. 1
author: Kentaro Miura
description: An epic dark fantasy tale of lone mercenary Guts as he moves forward facing numerous enemies in a grotesque world of dark fantasy.

title: The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses
author: Eric Ries
description: Introduces a new approach being adopted across the globe, changing the way companies are built and new products are launched.

title: Death Note, Vol. 1: Boredom
author: Tsugumi Ohba and Takeshi Obata
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the person's name while picturing their face.

title: Extreme Ownership: How U.S. Navy SEALs Lead and Win
author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
description: U.S. Navy SEAL officers who led the most highly decorated special operations unit of the Iraq War demonstrate how to apply powerful leadership principles from the battlefield to business and life.

title: Start with Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone to Take Action
author: Simon Sinek
description: A look at why some people and companies are more innovative, influential, and profitable than others.

title: My Hero Academia, Vol. 1
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Follow Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without superpowers in a world where they are the norm, but who still dreams of becoming a superhero himself.

title: Drive: The Surprising Truth About What Motivates Us
author: Daniel H. Pink
description: A deep dive into what truly motivates us at work and in life, debunking traditional notions of motivation driven by rewards and fear.

title: Attack on Titan, Vol. 1
author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, giant creatures that eat humans, a young man vows to destroy all Titans after a traumatic event.

title: Meditations
author: Marcus Aurelius
description: A series of personal writings by the Roman Emperor, providing a remarkable series of challenging spiritual reflections and exercises developed as he struggled to understand himself and make sense of the universe.

title: Man's Search for Meaning
author: Viktor E. Frankl
description: Psychologist Viktor Frankl's memoir has riveted generations of readers with its descriptions of life in Nazi death camps and its lessons for spiritual survival.

title: Essentialism: The Disciplined Pursuit of Less
author: Greg McKeown
description: Argues that by streamlining and focusing on what's essential, we can regain control of our choices and where we spend our precious time and energy.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical book that tells the story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel in search of a worldly treasure.

title: Grit: The Power of Passion and Perseverance
author: Angela Duckworth
description: Reveals that the secret to outstanding achievement is not talent but a special blend of passion and persistence she calls 'grit'.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
description: An ancient Chinese military treatise that is still used as a guide for war strategy and management.

title: The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life and Business
author: Charles Duhigg
description: A closer look at why habits exist and how they can be changed to cultivate success.

title: Vinland Saga, Vol. 1
author: Makoto Yukimura
description: An epic saga blending real historical events and characters with a gripping fictional narrative, following the adventures of a historic Viking quest.
